name: mini santa hat (amigurumi snowman accessory)
notes: this adorable mini santa hat is a quick and easy accessory designed to fit my chillin’ with my snowmies no sew snowman. it works up fast, uses simple stitches, and adds the sweetest festive touch to your handmade snowmen. because it’s sized for amigurumi, it may also fit other small toys with a similar head size. the **pdf included with this listing contains all three hat patterns** from the dress-up snowman collection: the mini santa hat the mini top hat the mini beanie **snowman patterns are not included** and can be purchased separately in my [**etsy**](https://tidd.ly/4q1xor7) or ravelry shop or viewed as an ad-supported free version on my blog. if you’d prefer to follow the free version of this pattern, it’s available on my blog. the printable, ad-free pdf is offered here in my ravelry shop and in my etsy shop for those who enjoy a clean, easy-to-print format or would like to support my work. **skill level:** easy **language:** english **terminology:** u.s. terminology i hope you enjoy dressing up your snowmies as much as i do!
